divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a clear night. I was only about 12 years old at the time ,believe me idont forget things like that. Any how it was like a straight line that wentup,and down,it was red also. But anyways not to long after that maybe a fewmonths I came across a UFO book with pictures in it of some sighting from thefew years ,and I saw the same one that was in book,the book stated thatsighting was last seen in the 70s. Ive always been into UFOs and thins likethat,so if you can please send me some info,on what you think it could of been.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around December 14th 1995
